headline: Occidental’s CEO Is a Favorite of Warren Buffett’s. She’s Been a Bust for Investors.
summary: Since Hollub became CEO in April 2016, Occidental stock has been in the bottom 10 stocks among the 50 in the S&P oil and gas exploration and production index.

headline: ExxonMobil Defies Weak Oil Prices With $500 Million Refining Boost
summary: ExxonMobil Corp. expects to post a sharp rebound in refining profitability for the third quarter of 2025, forecasting a $500 million increase in refining earnings compared to the previous quarter

headline: How XOM Expects Oil Prices & Refining Margins to Impact Q3 Earnings

headline: Petrobras: Cheap For A Reason - Politics Back In Focus (Rating Downgrade)
